content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Electricity generator at position(-7.5, 23.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler at position (-7.5, 23.0)
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe connecting the boiler and offshore pump at position (-9.5, 23.5)
- Small electric pole at position (-5.5, 21.5)

#### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (0, 0) and a furnace at position (0, 0)

#### Iron plate mine at position(5, 5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (5, 5) and a furnace at position (5, 5)

#### Lab at position(5, 5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (5, 5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items from inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into other entities. In this case, you attempted to insert coal into the boiler without having any coal in your inventory.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
